Bio:
Glitterballs are the ultimate glamrock tribute band, performing all your favourites from the 70's glam era in full costume. We are made up of 4 well seasoned(old ha ha) musicians, three of whom each have our own solo acts 
Glitterballs are :- James luke...solo guitarist /singer- guitar/bv's 
Billy no mates :- solo singing drummer- drums bv's 
Paul Darren - solo artist- vocals 
Path :- rythym guitar/bv's 
Ideal for any excuse for a party ,corporate, birthday wedding, or owt you like, we can make a party out of anything. 
contact us on 07766763067(james) or 07723459869 (Den) 

keep it glam!
